Title:
Notes on powdery mildews (Erysiphales) in Thailand III.
Erysiphe species on Fabaceae, Fagaceae, Hydrangeaceae and Lamiaceae
Keywords:
Anamorph 路 Biodiversity 路 Erysiphaceae 路 Molecular
phylogeny 路 Tropics
Abstract:
This report provides morphological descriptions of powdery
mildew specimens found on Fabaceae, Fagaceae, Hydrangeaceae and
Lamiaceae and molecular phylogenetic analyses based on ITS rDNA
sequences. These include 2 new host records for Erysiphe in the world,
viz., Mucuna bracteata (Fabaceae) and Microtoena insuavis (Lamiaceae).
In addition, 16 records of Erysiphe new to Thailand were described.
